passwordDisplay.label: Generated Password
passwordDisplay.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one character type

characters.label: Include Characters
characters.excludeSimilar: Exclude Similar Characters (i, l, 1, L, o, 0, O)

secure.title: 100% Secure & Private
secure.description: All passwords are generated locally in your browser. Nothing is sent to any server, ensuring your passwords remain completely private.

strong.title: Cryptographically Strong
strong.description: Uses secure random number generation to create truly random passwords that are resistant to brute-force attacks.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Choose length from 8-32 characters and select which character types to include: uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.

strengthCheck.title: Real-Time Strength Check
strengthCheck.description: Instantly see password strength with visual indicators and estimated crack time to ensure maximum security.

copy.title: One-Click Copy
copy.description: Quickly copy generated passwords to clipboard with a single click. Perfect for fast password creation and usage.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No registration required, no limits on usage. Generate unlimited secure passwords completely free of charge.
